title: Enhancing Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Reflective Teaching Improvement Workshop Using Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate knowledge in scientific disciplines, basic digital literacy, and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more learner engagement patterns using learning analytics tools and incorporate them into instructional design.
Learners develop the competency to provide personalized feedback to individual students at least twice based on weekly learning data.
Learners experience the process of revising and improving lesson plans at least twice by applying a reflective practice model.
Learners design an evaluation framework to measure instructional effectiveness using three indicators based on learning analytics results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
